content: ombrella is a top-down sweater with intricate looking motifs featured on the front back and sleeves the cable panels are deceiptively intuitive and the pattern s simple constructions makes it a versatile garment to adapt to one s taste and body **sizes ** 1 2 / 3 / 4 / 5 6 / 7 / 8 / 9 all measurements are those of the finished sweater see last pictures for schematic and complete measurements finished bust circumference 86 94 / 106 / 114 / 126 138 / 146 / 154 / 162 cm 33 ¾ 37 / 41 ¾ / 44 ¾ / 49 ½ 54 ¼ / 57 ½ / 60 ¾ / 63 ¾ choose a size with about 5 cm 2 positive ease at bust shown in size 2 on a 88 cm 34 ¾ bust **yarn ** you will need 1030 1095 / 1250 / 1350 / 1450 1570 / 1650 / 1750 / 1850 meters 1125 1200 / 1370 / 1480 / 1585 1720 / 1805 / 1915 / 2025 yards of dk weight yarn the sample is knit with slavica yarns mokosh in sorbus **needles ** main fabric 4 mm us 6 circular needles with appropriate length to knit in the round and magic loop or dpns ribbing 3 5 mm us 4 circular needles with appropriate length to knit in the round and magic loop or dpns or size required to get gauge **gauge ** 20 sts x 29 rnds per 10 cm 4 with larger needles in stockinette after blocking 26 5 sts x 32 row per 10 cm 4 with larger needles in cable motif after blocking **notions ** stitch markers progress keeper recommended tapestry needle and scissors scrap yarn to place sts on hold cable needle row counters recommended **techniques used ** top down set-in sleeve sweater garter shoulders shaped with wrap & turn short row simple increases to shape the armholes cable panels on the front back and sleeves featuring twisted stitches and knit / purl cables over 4 5 and 12 sts twisted ribbing optional german short-row bust darts based on cup size sleeve cap shaped with wrap & turn short row tappered sleeves with simple decreases garter & 2/2 ribbing hem cuffs and collar texture is charted only ------------------------------------------------------------------- ombrella est un pull tricoté du haut vers le bas avec des motifs entrelacés présents sur le devant le dos et les manches les panneaux de torsades sont plus intuitifs qu ils ne le paraissent et la construction simple du patron en font un vêtement polyvalent à adapter à ses goûts et à sa morphologie **tailles ** 1 2 / 3 / 4 / 5 6 / 7 / 8 / 9 toutes les mesures sont celles du pull fini voir dernières photos pour le schéma technique et toutes les mesures tour de buste du pull 86 94 / 106 / 114 / 126 138 / 146 / 154 / 162 cm choisissez une taille avec environ 5
